results.description: Police Scotland investigates fan misbehaviour, including spitting at a match official, at Saturday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Ayr United.
results.shortTitle: Police investigate spitting at official
results.title: Police Scotland investigates Ayr United fans after spitting at match official

results.description: Former Ayr United and Barr Construction chairman Bill Barr dies, leaving the football club "deeply saddened".
results.shortTitle: Ayr pay tribute to former chairman Barr
results.title: Bill Barr: Ayr United pay tribute as former chairman dies

thumbnail.altText: Former Ayr United chairman Bill Barr

results.description: Queen of the South pick up their first Championship win in four games by beating Ayr at Palmerston Park.
results.shortTitle: Queens beat Ayr to end losing run
results.title: Queen of the South 3-1 Ayr United

thumbnail.altText: Gary Oliver (right) celebrates with Stephen Dobbie against Dumbarton

results.description: Craig Moore fires a double as Ayr United ensure a miserable return for former boss Ian McCall as they prove too strong for Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Ayr thrash Thistle on McCall return
results.title: Ayr Utd 4-1 Partick Thistle: Ian McCall loses on Somerset return

thumbnail.altText: Ayr United congratulate two-goal hero Craig Moore

results.description: Ayr United boss Mark Kerr speaks about his introduction to management as he prepares to face Partick Thistle and former manager Ian McCall on Saturday.
results.shortTitle: 'Nobody knows what I've done. I'm ready for it' - Ayr boss Kerr on management
results.title: Ayr United boss Mark Kerr speaks about his introduction to management

results.description: Ayr United remain three points adrift of Dundee United at the top of the Scottish Championship after a frantic second-half against Morton.
results.shortTitle: Ayr come from behind to beat Morton
results.title: Morton 2-3 Ayr United: Visitors come from behind to earn win

results.description: Mark Kerr fails to guide Ayr top of the Scottish Championship on his managerial debut as Dundee claim their first away win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Dundee hand Ayr boss Kerr debut defeat
results.title: Ayr United 1-2 Dundee: New boss Mark Kerr loses first game in charge

results.description: Mark Kerr says it is an "extremely proud moment" after Ayr United confirmed his appointment as their new manager.
results.shortTitle: Kerr named new Ayr United manager
results.title: Ayr United: Mark Kerr announced as new manager

results.description: Andy Ryan scores a late winner as Dunfermline beat Ayr to post their first home Scottish Championship win of the season.
results.shortTitle: Dunfermline beat Ayr to gain first home win
results.title: Dunfermline Athletic 3-2 Ayr United: First home win of season for Pars

results.description: Ayr United say they will choose their new manager on Monday, and hope to announce who Ian McCall's replacement is the following day.
results.shortTitle: Ayr to confirm new manager on Tuesday
results.title: Ayr United: New manager by Tuesday, says Lachlan Cameron

thumbnail.altText: Ayr's Alan Forrest and Andy Geggan

results.description: Ayr United will begin interviewing candidates to replace Ian McCall as manager on Tuesday, says chairman Lachlan Cameron.
results.shortTitle: Ayr shortlist of six to replace McCall
results.title: Ayr United: Shortlist of six to replace Ian McCall as manager

results.description: Manager-less Ayr United miss the chance to move top of the Scottish Championship as Inverness claim a deserved victory at Somerset Park.
results.shortTitle: Ayr miss chance to go top as ICT win
results.title: Ayr United 0-2 Inverness Caledonian Thistle: Hosts miss chance to go top

thumbnail.altText: James Vincent (centre) celebrates scoring for Inverness CT

results.description: Partick Thistle manager Ian McCall believes Sandy Stewart should succeed him at Ayr United, who he rates as the best team in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayr 'miles ahead' of Dundee Utd - McCall
results.title: Ayr United 'miles ahead' of Dundee United and should appoint Sandy Stewart - Ian McCall

thumbnail.altText: Ayr United caretaker manager Sandy Stewart

results.description: A stunning first-half performance gives Ayr United a comfortable 3-0 victory over Arbroath to ensure they stay level on points at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayr breeze past Arbroath to stay joint top
results.title: Arbroath 0-3 Ayr United: Manager-less Ayr keep up superb form

results.description: Ayr United striker Kris Doolan says his team-mates would support giving caretakers Sandy Stewart and Mark Kerr the reins permanently.
results.shortTitle: Doolan backs Stewart & Kerr for Ayr job
results.title: Ayr United: Caretakers Sandy Stewart and Mark Kerr have player backing - Kris Doolan

results.description: Ian McCall becomes Partick Thistle manager for the second time after leaving Scottish Championship rivals Ayr United.
results.shortTitle: McCall appointed Partick Thistle manager
results.title: Partick Thistle: Ian McCall appointed manager after Ayr United exit

results.description: Ayr United boss Ian McCall is set to become Partick Thistle manager for the second time.
results.shortTitle: McCall set to return as Thistle manager
results.title: Partick Thistle: Ian McCall poised to leave Ayr United for Firhill return

results.description: Ayr United sweep aside Alloa Athletic to earn their fifth win in six Scottish Championship games and keep pace with Dundee United at the summit.
results.shortTitle: Ayr thrash Alloa to keep pace at top
results.title: Alloa Athletic 1-4 Ayr United: Ian McCall's side keep pace at top

results.description: Lawrence Shankland endures a miserable return to his former club as Ayr United end Dundee United's winning start and join them at the top of the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Ayr beat United to move joint top
results.title: Ayr United 2-0 Dundee United: Hosts move joint top

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019
